turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to place a I want to place an order at the Starbucks that's on Alvarado in Los Angeles, California.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need it to be venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to add any milk to your venti signature espresso?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Not at this time. But I just wanted to throw in a a dab of sugar.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, i will add in the notes a request for a little bit of sugar.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your coffee has been ordered and should be ready for pick up soon. You will receive a text message with your receipt shortly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else i can help you with?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thank you and have a great day.
